content: whether you re looking for a fun scrap afghan project or a mindless make the bespoke bliss blanket is sure to be your next favorite the bespoke bliss afghan can be made with any weight yarn just pick one type for the project it is easy to size up or down because it uses very basic crochet stitches it is also a perfect beginner project it s a great go-to mindless crochet my heart out kind of crochet project crocheters of all levels will love perfect for evening crochet and movie binges with endless variations for every baby blanket or gift afghan you can dream up
